item.title: Python: Regex
item.description: Regular Expressions (regex) Regular expressions are used to search a string for matches of a specific pattern. They can be used to make finding information a lot easier, especially in large files. You can also use regex to search and replace operations to make changes across many files. Some other uses include parsing/replacing strings, reformatting/cleaning/stripping data, web scraping, and much more. The following is a regex cheat sheet: re.match(r“expression”,string) returns the first match in the string.
